tooltip.abunchoftotems.totem_of_returnal: Right-click to teleport to your spawnpoint
tooltip.abunchoftotems.totem_of_blinking: Right-click to teleport to your crosshair (128-block range)
tooltip.abunchoftotems.totem_of_vitality: Hold right-click to rapidly regenerate health
tooltip.abunchoftotems.totem_of_resilien: Right-click to consume and gain invulnerability for 10 seconds
tooltip.abunchoftotems.totem_of_wisdom.t: Right-click to consume and gain 25 levels
tooltip.abunchoftotems.totem_of_conducti: Hold right-click to charge, then release to strike
